sentences.en: A kindly landlady is obliging and cheerful in her old age.
sentences.cn: 一位和善的女房东,她已到了老年,亲切而愉快.

sentences.en: By nature inoffensive, friendly, and obliging, his presentation at St. James's had made him courteous.
sentences.cn: 生来不肯得罪人, 待人接物总是和蔼可亲, 殷勤体贴.而且自从觐见皇上以来, 更加彬彬有礼.

sentences.en: He also refused to be obliging to his fares.
sentences.cn: 对于车座儿,他绝对不客气.

sentences.en: He is an extremely pleasant and obliging man.
sentences.cn: 他是个非常友善、古道热肠的人。

sentences.en: He is very obliging. He's sure to help if you ask him.
sentences.cn: 他好说话儿, 求求他准行.

sentences.en: He knew they were such rogues that there was no obliging to them.
sentences.cn: 他深知他们都是坏蛋,没法对他们宽大.

sentences.en: He was kindly, within his scanty means generous, and obliging.
sentences.cn: 他和蔼可亲, 在自己菲薄的经济能力范围内乐善好施, 有求必应.

sentences.en: I had shown an obliging disposition to render her some little services.
sentences.cn: 我表示愿意为她办些零星小事.

sentences.en: It was obliging of him to take so much trouble.
sentences.cn: 他这样不怕麻烦真是助人为乐.

sentences.en: On the whole, animals are very obliging in communicating with humans.
sentences.cn: 总体上, 动物在与人沟通是非常和顺.

sentences.en: Rebecca was of a good - natured and obliging disposition ; and she like Amelia rather than otherwise.
sentences.cn: 利蓓加脾气好,肯迁就,而且一点也不讨厌爱米丽亚.

sentences.en: The maid in the lime - coloured panties was a cheerful fat, obliging woman in her mid - thirties.
sentences.cn: 那个身穿白色紧身短裤的胖女佣人不过 三十五 、六岁,为人活泼, 有求必应.

sentences.en: The obliging waiter was in no hurry for us to leave.
sentences.cn: 这位有礼貌的侍者并不急着催促我们离开.

sentences.en: The shop assistant was very obliging.
They were very obliging and offered to wait for us.
sentences.cn: 他们非常热情，主动提出等候我们。

sentences.en: Very comfortable, The attendants are quite obliging.
sentences.cn: 非常舒服.服务非常周到.
